title: Libra sans
content:
I remember seeing a sans-serif version of [Libra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043546/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/libra/), designed by de Roos as a sorta modern version of the uncial. I'm wondering if anybody can remind me what that face is called, and tell me if there's a digital version of it available.

thanks...
author: zach h.

comments.content: It was called Simplex, and it was apparently co-designed with Dick Dooijes.

That's totally it. Thanks!

I see there's a digital version through monotype...
